channel.title: Hybrid PvP v3 Slayer Shop NPC?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've got a question.
I was changing the PK-Points price for d claws in 'ShopAssistant.java'
And i also saw a special kind of points, which were slayer points. And I also saw Item ID's next to it.
Now the problem is that i don't know which NPC is running that slayer points shop..
So does anyone know what NPC HyBriD PvP v3 is using for the Item Shop?
PS: Trading Duradel does'nt work.
Thanks in advance!
- Mthijs3.

item.title: Hybrid PvP v3 Slayer Shop NPC?

item.description:
